mapper.select: SELECT a.PARAMETER_CODE AS "KEY" ,a.PARAMETER_NAME AS "VALUE" FROM ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.PARAMETER a JOIN ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.PARAMETER_CATEGORY b ON a.PARAMETER_CATEGORY_ID = b.PARAMETER_CATEGORY_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.SYSTEM_ID = b.SYSTEM_ID AND a.STATUS = b.STATUS AND b.STATUS = 1 AND b.SYSTEM_ID = 'eservice_jd' AND b.CATEGORY_CODE = 'JDZQ_POLICY_TYPE_CATEGORY' ORDER BY a.SORT_NO
